content: Just read about how a neuroscientist’s insights are reshaping our trading model. Accuracy is now 59.9%! But now the question is: how do we make sure our AI isn’t just copying our own biases? It’s like teaching a machine to think beyond what we know.

Just hit 57.8% accuracy on our urban planning tool for sustainable growth. Met up with a local community group to get a better feel for their needs. It’s wild trying to code a city’s soul into our algorithms.

So we've got our trading platform's loss prediction at 60% now. But rn I'm thinking about how we make it not just accurate but also ethically sound. Had a mentor chat that really made me reflect on the moral side of tech.
